name: Polish Mistakes
author: MKLADY
summary: A great appetizer that is loved by all, especially men. Serve these meaty, cheesy delights on game day! For later use, place the topped bread on a cookie sheet in the freezer for 1 hour. Once frozen, the slices may be stored in freezer bags.
directions: Place ground beef, sausage and onion in a large, deep skillet
Cook over medium high heat until meat is evenly brown and onions are soft
Mix in the processed cheese food, oregano and Worcestershire sauce
Stir continuously until the cheese is melted
If the bread is not sliced, cut it into thin slices
Spoon approximately 1 tablespoon of the mixture onto each slice
Place the slices in a single layer on a baking pan
Broil the slices 10 minutes, or until the cheese is slightly browned and the bread is toasted
